title: 80/621/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 June 1980 finding that the apparatus described as 'NAC film motion analyzer, model 160 B' is not a scientific apparatus
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 11 June 1980  finding that the apparatus described as "NAC film motion analyzer, model 160 B" is not a scientific apparatus  (80/621/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as "NAC film motion analyzer, model 160 B" is not considered to be a scientific apparatus.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
